summary: it was really interesting to hear about his point of view regarding his upload schedule on youtube. i think it was so necessary...
body: it was really interesting to hear about his point of view regarding his upload schedule on youtube. i think it was so necessary to say what he actually thinks because personally now i just expect less. because he said that his content isn’t only on youtube, and its been like that since 2009. according to him live shows, tweets, instagram stories etc.. are content and i frankly don’t disagree. and him valuing creativity over going up the charts really surprised me. because obviously we don’t know him and i used to think that he stressed out about his uploading schedule but he doesn’t really care that much more about youtube than any other platform. its just interesting. and im glad that he talked about it

reblog.comment: it was really interesting to hear about his point of view regarding his upload schedule on youtube. i think it was so necessary to say what he actually thinks because personally now i just expect less. because he said that his content isn’t only on youtube, and its been like that since 2009. according to him live shows, tweets, instagram stories etc.. are content and i frankly don’t disagree. and him valuing creativity over going up the charts really surprised me. because obviously we don’t know him and i used to think that he stressed out about his uploading schedule but he doesn’t really care that much more about youtube than any other platform. its just interesting. and im glad that he talked about it

trail.content: it was really interesting to hear about his point of view regarding his upload schedule on youtube. i think it was so necessary to say what he actually thinks because personally now i just expect less. because he said that his content isn’t only on youtube, and its been like that since 2009. according to him live shows, tweets, instagram stories etc.. are content and i frankly don’t disagree. and him valuing creativity over going up the charts really surprised me. because obviously we don’t know him and i used to think that he stressed out about his uploading schedule but he doesn’t really care that much more about youtube than any other platform. its just interesting. and im glad that he talked about it

summary:
- dan saying “if i die tomorrow” well bitch no u cant okay
- him giving all the money off of his new merch to young minds is...
body:
- dan saying “if i die tomorrow” well bitch no u cant okay

- him giving all the money off of his new merch to young minds is just- hes a good man and honestly what a great cause

- when he massaged his face, that was adorable u rat

- “when dan and phil come up with a name its either susan or steve there you go” we love that thanks

- when he said that he moved out of reading and then “finding his own existence” made me soft because he’s literally grown so much and im proud of him

- “look forward to phils video” love that support

- and that whole speech at the end, i shed a tear. it was so emotional and i just missed him so much. its literally like talking to my big brother who i fucking miss so much hi it was really nice.

blog.name: dailydanandphilpredictions
blog.title: There Is A Probability
blog.description: How much of a chance is there that a video will be uploaded?

summary: By the sounds of it, they will start doing their (semi)scheduled livestreams. If that is the case, my “likeliness of a...
body: By the sounds of it, they will start doing their (semi)scheduled livestreams. If that is the case, my “likeliness of a livestream” predicion will be changed, removed, or turned to represent exclusively when there will be a joint livestream. Those are all typically announced an hour in advance, and don’t follow a schedule, do that will be best suited for what I’m doing.
